name: Vixen: The Movie
summary: The release sees the first two seasons combined into a single story, with 15 minutes of never-before-seen content. Bonus features on the release include the Justice League Unlimited episodes "Hunter's Moon" and "Grudge Match" and a new featurette.
info:
• 中文名: 雌狐：大电影
  • 话数: 1
  • 上映年度: 2017-05-08
  • 片长: 75分钟
  • 导演: Curt Geda
